page.title: 03SOUTH HANTS STRUCTURE PLAN 2
page.content: THE MAIN PROPOSAL CATEGORIES FOR DEVELOPMENT WERE:_ JOBS,HOMES,SHOPS, RECREATION,COUNTRYSIDE AND COAST, BUILT UP AREAS AND PUPLIC AND PRIVATE TRANSPORT. UNDER EACH OF THESE IT WAS PLANNED THAT MUCH OF THE DEVELOPMENT WOULD MAKE THE BEST USE OF EXISTING FACILITIES AND ALSO THAT SOUTH HAMPSHIRE HERITAGE AND SSSI WOULD BE PRESERVED. THE WHOLE SOUTH HAMPSHIRE AREA WAS DIVIDED INTO INDIVIDUAL UNITS AND EACH UNIT HAD ITS OWN DISTRICT PLAN. CHANDLERS FORD PLAN PROPOSES A MAJOR NEW AREA OF HOUSING BE DEVELOPED OVER THE NEXT 15 YEARS ALONG WITH MORE INDUSTRY,OFFICES AND LOCAL FACILITIES. VALLEY PARK,OPPOSITE CARREFOUR HYPERMARKET IN GRID 0442 0119 IS ONE SUCH HOUSING ESTATE(SEE SLIDE A ).
